Name: Undercraft
About the game: Undercraft is a sandbox game set in a procedurally generated world. Have different experiences every time you play the game. Explore this vast world alone or with friends. Day and Night Find different types of enemies day and night. Be careful some enemies become more dangerous on certain nights. Caves Found caves on the map and collect rare resources to craft. Explore the vast world Explore the world, cut trees, and find resources. Create your world procedural Discover new lands, and places, explore different types of biomes with different kinds of animals and items in them. Build Something Big Create buildings, and decorate inside or outside your house with everything you want. You can even destroy the houses of other players you found on the map.
